sentences.en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
sentences.cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: ancient dark volcanic rock
sentences.cn: 古老的黑色火山岩

sentences.en: Changing stresses bring about more cracking and rock deformation.
sentences.cn: 不断变化的应力导致更多的断裂和岩石变形。

sentences.en: He dashed off to lunch at the Hard Rock Cafe.
sentences.cn: 他急匆匆前往硬石小馆去吃午餐。

sentences.en: He drank thirstily from the pool under the rock.
sentences.cn: 他饥渴地喝着岩石下水潭中的水。

sentences.en: He had been a rock in the shifting sands of her existence.
sentences.cn: 他一直是她曲折坎坷的生活中的主心骨。

sentences.en: He has an easygoing managerial style and won't rock the boat unless absolutely necessary.
sentences.cn: 他有一套很随意的经营作风，除非极有必要否则不会改变自己一惯的做法

sentences.en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentences.cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentences.en: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
sentences.cn: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。

sentences.en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentences.en: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.cn: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。

sentences.en: massive rock formations
sentences.cn: 巨大的岩层

sentences.en: Most of the country is desert and bare rock .
sentences.cn: 这个国家大部分地区都是沙漠和裸露的岩石。

sentences.en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentences.cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentences.en: Our accountant says the business is on the rocks.
sentences.cn: 我们的会计师说生意濒临破产

sentences.en: Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.cn: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialized and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 自朋克乐之后，摇滚乐已经变得太商业化、太保守了。

sentences.en: Scotch on the rocks.
sentences.cn: 加冰块的苏格兰威士忌酒

sentences.en: She covered her face, rocking to and fro in her grief.
sentences.cn: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.en: The city was walled and built upon a rock.
sentences.cn: 这座城市建在岩石上，四周筑有城墙。

sentences.en: The hills above the valley are bare rock.
sentences.cn: 河谷上面的山是光秃秃的岩石。

sentences.en: The house stands on a shelf of rock among pines.
sentences.cn: 房子矗立在松树丛中一块突出的岩石上。

sentences.en: the late rock star, Freddie Mercury
sentences.cn: 已故摇滚乐明星弗雷迪·默丘利

sentences.en: The rough rock walls were like the sides of a deep canal.
sentences.cn: 凸凹不平的石墙就像一条很深的运河的河岸。

sentences.en: The stadium has hosted numerous rock concerts .
sentences.cn: 这个体育场举行过许多场摇滚乐音乐会。

sentences.en: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
sentences.cn: 波浪使小船左摇右晃。

sentences.en: Their marriage is on the rocks.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻濒于破裂

sentences.en: To build the tunnel, they had to cut through 500 feet of solid rock .
sentences.cn: 为了建这条隧道，他们不得不凿穿500英尺的坚硬岩石。

words.tran_cn: 石头般的；坚硬如岩石的
岩石的，多岩石的；坚如岩石的；摇晃的；头晕目眩的
（美）山区乡村摇滚乐（起源于美国东南部）
摇杆；摇的人；镰刀弯；套钩；摇轴

phrases.phrase: between a rock and a hard place
phrases.tran_cn: 面临同样令人不愉快的几乎没有机会逃避或克服的选择
重摇滚；剧烈摇滚乐；硬质岩石

phrases.phrase: on the rocks informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: n. 储集岩；贮油岩；储油岩石
岩体；岩块，岩块体；岩石层
(非正式)如痴如狂地奏摇滚乐
岩石边坡；石坡；岩石坡；石流坡
比较轻柔的摇滚乐；软岩石
火山岩；火成岩；火山碎屑岩

trans.tran_cn: 岩石，石头，摇滚乐，棒糖，<非正式>宝石（尤指钻石）
trans.tran_en: a type of popular modern music with a strong loud beat, played using  guitar s  and drums
to make the future of something seem less certain or steady than it was before, especially because of problems or changes

trans.tran_cn: 演奏摇滚乐，随摇滚乐起舞
